languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Совершая одиночную атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} снижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} цели на 10% до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасина. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin attacks an enemy with a single target attack, this attack reduces the target's armour and dodge by −15% until the end of the Assassin's turn. Does not stack.
Whenever the Assassin attacks an enemy with a single target attack, this attack reduces the target's armour and dodge by −15% until the end of the Assassin's turn. Does not stack.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}使用单体攻击攻击敌人时，此次攻击会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低10%，直到刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当刺客使用单体攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}敌人时，此次攻击会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}降低15%，直到刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} ataca a un enemigo usando un ataque de un solo objetivo, el ataque reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del objetivo un −10% hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el asesino {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}ataca{/g} a un enemigo usando un ataque de un solo objetivo, el ataque reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del objetivo un -15% hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が単体攻撃で敵を攻撃するたび、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}が−10%減少する。スタックしない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが単体攻撃で敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}するたび、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避率{/g}が-15%減少する。スタックしない。

languages.text: Совершая одиночную атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} снижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} цели на 10% до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасина. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Совершая одиночную {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атаку{/g}, ассасин снижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} цели на 15% до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасина. Эффект не суммируется.

Совершая одиночную {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атаку{/g}, ассасин снижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} цели на 15% до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасина. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Wann immer der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} einen Feind per Einzelangriff angreift, reduziert dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels um −10 %, und zwar bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Assassinen. Stapelt sich nicht.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Assassine einen Feind per Einzelangriff {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}angreift{/g}, reduziert dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels um −15 %, und zwar bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Assassinen. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attaque un ennemi en lançant une attaque à cible unique, celle-ci réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de la cible de −10 % jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Assassin. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaque{/g} un ennemi en lançant une attaque à cible unique, celle-ci réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de la cible de -15 % jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Assassin. Non cumulable.
